contactFindOptions

Optional parameter of the [contacts.find](../contacts.find.html) method. Use this parameter to filter the contacts returned from the contacts database.

{ 
	filter: "",
	multiple: true,
};

Options

  • filter: The search string used to filter contacts. (DOMString) (Default: “”)
  • multiple: Determines if the find operation should return multiple contacts. (Boolean) (Default: false)
